name: Pokémon Moon
overview: In Pokémon Moon, embark on an adventure as a Pokémon Trainer and catch, battle, and trade all-new Pokémon on the tropical islands of the Alola Region. Engage in intense battles, and unleash powerful new moves. Discover and interact with Pokémon while training and connecting with your Pokémon to become the first ever Alolan Pokémon Champion! Thwart the plans of Team Skull and discover the mystery behind the Aether Foundation and the Ultra Beasts.
